title: Miscellaneous Circular
title-note: US Dept. of Agriculture, 1897-1929; revisions published into the 1940s
additional-notes: This is a US government publication.

Issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial. While all issues were originally published before 1930, some issues came out in revised editions as late as the 1940s.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
